Translations.Text: When they zapisat Joseph's miesto he brought jeho brat koniec do him said ja bol tvoj brat; nie saddened ich cin
When he zadovazit them ich provisions he miesto pne salka jeho brat taska potom announcer zahlasit majitel this caravan je zlodej
They said mat rad they pojdem them Co ona lose
They said My lost king's salka. Ktokolvek spatny listok it receive extra camel-load; ja personally zaruka this
They said GOD ona zauzlit full lepsie my nie pojdem tu commit zly nor je my zlodej
They said Co je punishment zlodej if ona bol liars
They said punishment it zalozit jeho taska bol lenze zlodej belongs do ona! My thus punish guilty

He potom zaciatok inspecting ich containers getting jeho brat container he vypis it jeho brat container! My thus zdokonalit kut plany Joseph; he nie kept jeho brat he applied king's zakon. Ze bol will GOD My exalt whomever my zvolit si higher ranks Above kazdy knowledgeable jeden there bol jeden je vecer knowledgeable
They said he stole so robit brat z jeho v the minuly, Joseph zatajit jeho feelings v nie dat them any clue He said (do Ona bol skutocne zly. GOD bol fully aware z TVOJ accusations)
They said O ona noble jeden he otca has je elderly ona berie jeden z us jeho miesto? My see ona bol laskavy clovek
He said GOD zakazat my berie 1 whose imanie my zalozit our goods. Inak my bol unjust
